lead_paragraph: The track coach Trevor Graham, who helped begin a three-year federal inquiry of steroid use by elite athletes, is expected to be charged in San Francisco as soon as today with obstructing the investigation, according to two Justice Department officials. Granted anonymity because the charges had not been made public, the officials said Graham would be charged with making false statements to authorities investigating steroid use in sports.
